VLAN Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
1.0.3 01-18-2019 Added service VLANTagging3 with action GetVLANTaggingSettings3, which includes the following new output parameters:
  • vlanLowerLimit
  • vlanUpperLimit
Added SinglePortVLANTaggingSettings2, which includes the following new members:
  • vlanLowerLimit
  • vlanUpperLimit
1.0.2 01-27-2017 Added struct SinglePortVLANTaggingSettings to support single port VLAN tagging.
1.0.1 09-03-2015 Added support for WAN tagging priority, including the following:
  • struct VLANTaggingSettings2
  • struct PortTaggingSettings2
  • struct VLANProfile2
  • Action GetProfiles2
  • Action GetVLANTaggingSettings2
  • Action SetVLANTaggingSettings2
1.0.0 2013 Initial release

Services

VLANTagging

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANTagging
This service provides access to a router's VLAN Tagging settings.

Service Actions

  • GetProfiles
  • GetVLANTaggingSettings
  • SetVLANTaggingSettings

VLANTagging2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANTagging2
This service provides access to a router's VLAN Tagging settings.

Service Actions

  • GetProfiles2
  • GetVLANTaggingSettings2
  • SetVLANTaggingSettings2

VLANTagging3

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANTagging3

Service Actions

  • GetProfiles2
  • GetVLANTaggingSettings3
  • SetVLANTaggingSettings2

Actions

GetProfiles

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfiles
This action gets the list of pre-defined ISP profiles.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
profiles VLANProfile[] no List of pre-defined ISP profiles

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfilesResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfiles"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "profiles": [
      {
        "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
        "vlanTaggingSettings": {
          "wanSettings": {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          },
          "ipTVSettings": [
            {
              "vlanID": 123,
              "vlanPriority": 7,
              "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
            }
          ],
          "voIPSettings": [
            {
              "vlanID": 123,
              "vlanPriority": 7,
              "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetProfiles2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfiles2
This action gets the list of pre-defined ISP profiles. This version uses structure VLANProfile2, making vlanPriority an optional field.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
profiles VLANProfile2[] no List of pre-defined ISP profiles

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfiles2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetProfiles2"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "profiles": [
      {
        "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
        "vlanTaggingSettings": {
          "wanSettings": {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          },
          "ipTVSettings": [
            {
              "vlanID": 123,
              "vlanPriority": 7,
              "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
            }
          ],
          "voIPSettings": [
            {
              "vlanID": 123,
              "vlanPriority": 7,
              "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetVLANTaggingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings
This action gets the router's VLAN tagging settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isEnabled bool no Whether VLAN tagging is enabled.
profile VLANProfile yes The current VLANProfile. Only exists if a profile has previously been set.
maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort int no The maximum number of VLAN Tagging settings allowed per port

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isEnabled": true,
    "profile": {
      "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
      "vlanTaggingSettings": {
        "wanSettings": {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        },
        "ipTVSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ],
        "voIPSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort": 123
  }
}

GetVLANTaggingSettings2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings2
This action gets the router's VLAN tagging settings. This version uses structure VLANProfile2, making vlanPriority an optional field.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isEnabled bool no Whether VLAN tagging is enabled.
isVLANPrioritySupported bool no Whether VLAN tagging priority is supported on the platform.
profile VLANProfile2 yes The current VLANProfile. Only exists if a profile has previously been set.
maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort int no The maximum number of VLAN Tagging settings allowed per port

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings2"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isEnabled": true,
    "isVLANPrioritySupported": true,
    "profile": {
      "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
      "vlanTaggingSettings": {
        "wanSettings": {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        },
        "ipTVSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ],
        "voIPSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort": 123
  }
}

GetVLANTaggingSettings3

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings3
This action gets the router's VLAN tagging settings. This version includes limits on the range of supported VLAN Id's for the platform.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isEnabled bool no Whether VLAN tagging is enabled.
isVLANPrioritySupported bool no Whether VLAN tagging priority is supported on the platform.
profile VLANProfile2 yes The current VLANProfile. Only exists if a profile has previously been set.
maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort int no The maximum number of VLAN Tagging settings allowed per port.
vlanLowerLimit int no The lower limit of the range of supported VLAN Id's.
vlanUpperLimit int no The upper limit of the range of supported VLAN Id's.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings3Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/GetVLANTaggingSettings3"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isEnabled": true,
    "isVLANPrioritySupported": true,
    "profile": {
      "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
      "vlanTaggingSettings": {
        "wanSettings": {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        },
        "ipTVSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ],
        "voIPSettings": [
          {
            "vlanID": 123,
            "vlanPriority": 7,
            "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "maxVLANTaggingRulesPerPort": 123,
    "vlanLowerLimit": 123,
    "vlanUpperLimit": 123
  }
}

SetVLANTaggingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettings
This action sets the router's VLAN tagging settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isEnabled bool no Whether VLAN tagging should be enabled.
profile VLANProfile no The desired VLANProfile to be applied.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorDuplicateVLANIDs The duplicated VLAN IDs have different VLAN Priority values.
ErrorInvalidVLANID One of the specified VLAN ID is invalid.
ErrorInvalidVLANPriority One of the specified VLAN Priority value is invalid.
ErrorInvalidVLANProfileName The specified profile name is invalid.
ErrorTooManyVLANTaggingRules The specified list of VLAN rules contains more than the maximum allowed number of rules specified by the maxVLANTaggingSettingsPerPortmember of the GetVLANTaggingSettings action.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettings"

{
  "isEnabled": true,
  "profile": {
    "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
    "vlanTaggingSettings": {
      "wanSettings": {
        "vlanID": 123,
        "vlanPriority": 7,
        "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
      },
      "ipTVSettings": [
        {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        }
      ],
      "voIPSettings": [
        {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetVLANTaggingSettings2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettings2
This action sets the router's VLAN tagging settings. This version uses structure VLANProfile2, making vlanPriority an optional field.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isEnabled bool no Whether VLAN tagging should be enabled.
profile VLANProfile2 no The desired VLANProfile to be applied.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettings2Result
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorDuplicateVLANIDs The duplicated VLAN IDs have different VLAN Priority values.
ErrorInvalidVLANID One of the specified VLAN ID is invalid.
ErrorInvalidVLANPriority One of the specified VLAN Priority value is invalid.
ErrorInvalidVLANProfileName The specified profile name is invalid.
ErrorTooManyVLANTaggingRules The specified list of VLAN rules contains more than the maximum allowed number of rules specified by the maxVLANTaggingSettingsPerPortmember of the GetVLANTaggingSettings action.
ErrorVLANPriorityNotSupported The vlanPriority field was included on a platform that doesn't support it.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/SetVLANTaggingSettings2"

{
  "isEnabled": true,
  "profile": {
    "name": "Maxis (Fibre)",
    "vlanTaggingSettings": {
      "wanSettings": {
        "vlanID": 123,
        "vlanPriority": 7,
        "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
      },
      "ipTVSettings": [
        {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        }
      ],
      "voIPSettings": [
        {
          "vlanID": 123,
          "vlanPriority": 7,
          "vlanStatus": "Tagged"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

PortTaggingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/PortTaggingSettings
Tagging settings applied to a port.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
vlanID int no The VLAN tagging ID currently set for this port. The ID must be between 1-4095.
vlanPriority int no The VLAN tagging priority set for this port. This value must be between 0-7. Higher value means higher priority.
vlanStatus TaggingStatus no The VLAN tagging status currently set for this port.

PortTaggingSettings2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/PortTaggingSettings2
Tagging settings applied to a port. This version makes vlanPriority an optional field, as it's not supported on some platforms.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
vlanID int no The VLAN tagging ID currently set for this port. This value must fall within the range of supported VLAN Id's.
vlanPriority int yes The VLAN tagging priority set for this port. This value must be between 0-7. Higher value means higher priority.
vlanStatus TaggingStatus no The VLAN tagging status currently set for this port.

VLANProfile

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANProfile

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no Name of the ISP.
vlanTaggingSettings VLANTaggingSettings no VLAN tagging settings for the profile.

VLANProfile2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANProfile2
This version uses structure VLANTaggingSettings2, making vlanPriority an optional field.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no Name of the ISP.
vlanTaggingSettings VLANTaggingSettings2 no VLAN tagging settings for the profile.

VLANTaggingSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANTaggingSettings
VLAN tagging settings.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
wanSettings PortTaggingSettings no VLAN tagging settings for WAN port.
ipTVSettings PortTaggingSettings[] no VLAN tagging settings for IPTV port.
voIPSettings PortTaggingSettings[] no VLAN tagging settings for VoIP port.

VLANTaggingSettings2

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/VLANTaggingSettings2
VLAN tagging settings. This version uses structure PortTaggingSettings2, making vlanPriority an optional field.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
wanSettings PortTaggingSettings2 no VLAN tagging settings for WAN port.
ipTVSettings PortTaggingSettings2[] no VLAN tagging settings for IPTV port.
voIPSettings PortTaggingSettings2[] no VLAN tagging settings for VoIP port.

Enumerations

TaggingStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/vlantagging/TaggingStatus
This service provides access to a router's vlan tagging settings. Possible values for port tagging.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Tagged Tagged
Untagged Untagged
